overview: He had the face of an angel... and the heart of a madman. Young, beautiful Christian (Calvin Banks) falls in love with irresistibly handsome Perry (Michael DelRay) only to discover that Perry is playing him for a fool. Distraught and humiliated, Christian's masturbatory fantasies begin to center on rough, angry sex and revenge fucking. But fantasies can only go so far to satisfy Christian's angry lust, and he soon finds he needs to experience the real thing.
title: Revenge
